name: base
description: Minimalistic JS framework for server rendered websites.

scripts.compile: babel --presets es2015,stage-0 -d lib/ src/ && babel --presets es2015,stage-0 src/modules/Component.js --out-file Component.js && babel --presets es2015,stage-0 src/modules/BaseComponent.js --out-file BaseComponent.js && babel --presets es2015,stage-0 src/modules/getComponentFromElement.js --out-file getComponentFromElement.js && babel --presets es2015,stage-0 src/modules/utils.js --out-file utils.js

author: Georgy Marchuk
